room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: This was my first escape room and it was so much fun! It’s designed for 8 people I believe, but it was only two of us so we had to just focus. Our host was so helpful. He only gave us hints when we both agreed on them, and made sure we didn’t waste our time. The Jekyll theme of the room was so cool, and the clues were very well thought out and befitting. We didn’t make it out, but we were very close. We can’t wait to come back.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: We did the Jekyl/Hyde room for my birthday this weekend and loved it! Best room we have played, by far. The host was amazing and we were well prepared, well assisted, and had an overall amazing time. Made it out with 9 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: I have to say this was the best room my boyfriend and I have done. I highly recommend this place for a fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: Set design is next level! Clues are clever and challenging! So much better than the competitors!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: This was one of my first times playing an escape room. Had two groups of 6 and everyone had a great time, even though some of my teammates weren't some of the smartest tools in the shed. The puzzles were hard but not impossible. The layouts were set up in a reasonable way also. The theme was pretty neat too! Jekyll and Hyde. Everyone was super attentive and helpful from booking the room to finishing up with photos for our groups at the end.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Hydeout" by Mission Escape Games in Philadelphia
review: We were the first customers to complete the Hydeout Room in Philadelphia. Originally the room was meant for eight, but Jose was nice enough to allow the 2 of us to figure out the room together. There's a total of 2 rooms to escape from and plenty of locks to figure out. The rooms are dark and triggers are automatic, so keep your eyes and ears sharp!
